author: UltPanda
description: A cog that allows users to snipe recently deleted messages.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Snipe cog! Users can now use the `[p]snipe` command to view recently deleted messages.
name: Snipe
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the content and metadata of deleted messages for a short period of time (up to 10 messages per server). No other end-user data is stored.
